snippet.title: Pokémon Daybreak NEW UPDATE Trailer! - Welcome to Armira!
snippet.description:
Pokémon Daybreak introduces the enigmatic region Armira, and is centralized around storytelling and challenging gameplay. There are new regional forms, new megas, a custom Pokédex consisting of all generations, and more. Take on the challenge of becoming Pokémon Champion in the all-embracing region of Armira!

This video is an updated version of the previous trailer, showcasing the overhauls present in the 2-year-long anticipated, v1.7 update!

Discord/Download: https://discord.gg/VBRN6vS

Wiki: https://pokemon-daybreak.fandom.com/w...

Relic Castle: https://reliccastle.com/threads/2612/


Pokemon Daybreak is developed by Mizzy and Raz. This is a free fan-made project that is not affiliated with The Pokemon Company, Game Freak or Nintendo in any way.
